lead_paragraph: The Japanese carmaker’s disclosure that it had used improper methods since 1991 calls the fuel efficiency of many models and millions of vehicles into question.

headline.print_headline: Mitsubishi Says It Cheated on Fuel Tests for Decades
headline.main: Mitsubishi Says It Cheated on Fuel Tests for 25 Years

snippet: The Japanese carmaker’s disclosure that it had used improper methods since 1991 calls the fuel efficiency of many models and millions of vehicles into question.
abstract: Mitsubishi Motors admits it used improper methods to test fuel economy of cars sold in Japan since 1991, significantly widening scope of mileage-doctoring scandal; company gives no indication it cheated on tests of cars sold outside Japan.
